title: £295.00 pw-1 bed in Melrose Ave, Willesden Gre5en, NW2 Ref: 532
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Melrose Ave, Willesden Gre5en, NW2
£295.00 Per Week
Ref: 532

Property Details
We are pleased to offer this lovely 1bedroom flat in Melrose Ave, Willesden Green, NW2.

The property consists of:
* Beautifully presented 1 bedroomed property which has been refurbished to an extremely high standard
* Contemporary fully fitted kitchen and bathroom with many quality fixtures and fittings.
* Spacious lounge
* The property is situated on this popular tree-lined road within walking distance to Gladstone park, Willesden green (jubilee line) station and Walm lane with its new bars and restaurants.
* Communal Garden
* Transport links include Cricklewood station (national rail) and Willesden green underground station (jubilee line).
* All Bills Including: Gas, Electricity, Water, Council Tax, TV Licence, and Internet for £200 pounds extra a month.
